Name: Mad Carnage
About the game: Can YOU survive the Mad Carnage? Mad Carnage is a turn-based strategy game, which requires tactical approach to the challenges it presents. Follow John Carnage in his post-apocalyptic adventure in the world of Mad Carnage! In the world after the Great War, you will take control of intimidating petrol beasts, each with their own unique weapons and gameplay mechanics. Upgrade your cars, then battle it out in Campaign mode or on one of the 8 Custom Game maps! Invite a friend for local Multiplayer versus!
